text: Luis Liberman Ginsburg (born 1 August 1947) is a Costa Rican businessperson and politician. He became the Second Vice President of Costa Rica in 2010. He was elected in February 2010 on the ticket with President Laura Chinchilla and First Vice President Alfio Piva. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents Category:Costa Rican politicians Category:Costa Rican businesspeople Category:People from San Jos√©, Costa Rica
title: Luis Liberman
